meanings.sent1: My chompers help me chew my food.
meanings.sent2: The dentist reminded me to brush my chompers twice a day.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bit my own tongue with my chompers!
meanings.sent4: Her shiny chompers sparkled like pearls in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's chompers were so strong, she could crack nuts with them.

meanings.definition: Someone or something that chomps or bites
meanings.sent1: The little dog was a tiny chompers, always nibbling on things.
meanings.sent2: The chompers on the conveyor belt were used to crush rocks into smaller pieces.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was known as the neighborhood chompers, stealing snacks from picnics.
meanings.sent4: The chompers of the law caught the cookie thief red-handed.
meanings.sent5: The monster in the movie had razor-sharp chompers that could cut through anything.
